About

Seth Greco   -   Software Engineer

 A graduate from the Univerisity of Texas at San Antonio in comp sci, Seth is currently working as a software engineer at a Fortunate 100 company in the financial and insurance sector. During his tenure he has helped develop the ground work for moving in-house application data to cloud, developing Jboss/Springboot web services for internal pathways. In his spare time Seth enjoys a variety of hobbies including hiking/backpacking, photography, and guitar as well as learning, reasearching and building webdev projects. Always looking for more, current experience and breath of knowledge encompasses Java, Python, Javascript, Html5/Css3, MongoDB and API development/consumption.  

Projects

React-Photo-Gallery

This is a React application and my first React application I have really completed to get a better understanding. I used mostly funcational components and hooks to complete this. Utlizing the Flickr API I call photos from my landscape photography based on state. Interacting with a USA SVG map to get the state photos I have accumlated. Other tech used in this is my own webpack and babel configurations. I compiled down the code to host it in the codebase of the portfolio page. essentially taking the entire React project and turning into a single file.

Tech-Stack: React, Sass, Webpack/Babel
